text: Vanessa Marshall Stiller (born October 19, 1969) is an American actress, singer and model. She is most active in voice-over roles for animated series, movies and video games. by notable in voice over shows like, Powerpuff Girls, Dexter's Laboratory, The Fairly OddParents as additional voices, and Nutri Ventures. In 2021, she was the voice of Nerdluck Blanko in Space Jam: A New Legacy. She is the daughter of actress Joan Van Ark and reporter John Marshall. She began voice-over work after being discovered at a one-woman show. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:Singers from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Vanessa Marshall
